examples:
Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I did not cancel the trial in time and the money was taken today. I am not using this product. Please can I get a refund and cancel the subscription? Thank you

Invoice no.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hello,
I have been looking through bank statements and did not realise this subscription was still active and perhaps has auto-renewed. I have not even used this product for a number of months, since first using it. If at all possible, would I be able to receive a refund for the monthly billing’s I have not used? I do not know if you can see when the account was used, however I know I used your product back in March last year to produce and print some posters, and I think I may have used it a couple months later without realising I was paying for premium. 

I understand if this is not possible, but your help in this matter would be greatly appreciated.

Regards,
<NAME>

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: HI there I just cancelled my subscription. I didnt receive a reminder email. However, I like the product very much, I cant affort it and I have not a lot of use. May you please refund me and cancel my subscription.

Kind regards,

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hi. I want to cancel my subscription. I was billed today. I would like to have a full refund. As you can see, I have not used the product. Thanks in advance.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hi I thought I cancelled within the trial period. I did not use the product. Is it possible to get a refund?

Account number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: Hello, please enter my position, my child accidentally signed up for this subscription, I didn't know anything about it, today I was charged for the product that I am not going to use, please return the money if it is possible.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I do not want the annual renew and do not use the product. Thank you and plz refund then cancel my subscription. Thank you.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: My apologies but I had not realised that I had an auto renew subscription.  With so many COVID disruptions and the necessity for remote teaching as I am a high school teacher,  I did not use the product in the way that I thought I would and no longer require the product.  Is a refund possible?

Invoice no.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I started a trial to test the product “Canva Pro” and I was unable to cancel the trial in time to prevent being charged. It was not intentional to allow the purchase to go through. I have not used the product since I tested out the trial and would like and appreciate a full refund as soon as possible as I have other bills due to pay. 

I look forward to hearing back from you. Thank you.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I am not going to be renewing or using your product. Please refund the money taken out on January <NUMBER>. Thanks.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I never used the website to do my project.  I thought the Pro would give me the tools that the free did not offer to do what I needed, but it did not.  Please refund the $12.95 as I did not use your product or services.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hi 
I don’t use this product as it’s not what I need for my business.  May I please cancel this subscription and get a refund for the payment that just came out please?  

Thank you,
<NAME>

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I have not used Canva this year and have intended to cancel my subscription. Is it at all possible to retroactively refund me for the month of January? I love the product but can no longer justify the cost. Thanks

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I love your product but no longer need it...  It auto-renewed today before I got a chance to cancel it...  I will happily re-subscribe for Pro again when I need it.   Thanks for your consideration...  <NAME>

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I have lost my short term memory and can't remember using this product. My husband has tracked your company down through the bank and has been able to cancel my account. I'm asking for a refund as I forgot about this and do not use your product. Thanks, <NAME>

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I never used this product and my password was not being accepted to cancel. Is there any possibility I could be refunded for the 3 months that were not used? I am out of work due to the pandemic and would greatly appreciate anything that can be done. thank you

Invoice no.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I have been charged £107.88 for a product that I did not sign up for or subscribe to.  I only use the free options or I pay the $1 options.  I would like this to be cancelled and refunded

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: need refund.  was charged $119.00.   I do not use your product.
<NUMBER>.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I missed the cut off date for my trial and I do not want to purchase this product

Account number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: When testing this product, it did not suit me, and I decided not to use it in the future. But since there was a function of automatic renewal of the subscription, my funds were debited. I am not going to use this product in the future, please return the funds.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: It was automatic renewal, I did not remember this and haven’t used Canva in months. I love the product I just can’t afford this right now.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I was told I would have til the end of the day 20th, or 21st would be renewed date and I have now been charged. Please refund this charge, as I have decided to go with another product after trying yours out.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hello- I am request to please CANCEL this subscription as I am not using the product.  Please refund the charge for January 26, 2021 and CANCAL all charges going forward. Thank you. Shari Hulin Epps

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I am not using the product and I got billed. How can I get reimbursed for this and cancel my subscription?

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: My daughter signed up using autofill I have been sick and just realized that this had been taken out of my account for months. She was trying to do a school project but never used your product

Invoice number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: I didn't know the subscription was automatic! I thought there was a free trial period. So I kindly ask for a refund for a product I've never used. Thanks!

Invoice no.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I did not agree to go ahead with the year  payment. I just sing up to see your products. you just took the money out of my account. please REFUND ASAP.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: We are not using the product anymore as it was taken for personal reasons,  would request the credit for the past 2 months that were charged and as well cancel my subscription. Thank you.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I never confirmed my account. I never used this product. I will recall the charge if you do not refund this charge.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: last subscription was done by a mistake . I have not used the product since then .

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I need both charges refunded.  I specifically cancelled this after getting my last bill.  I have not heard from anyone.  I had no intention on using this product and I am unemployed so it is really hurting my bank account.  Please refund ASAP. Thank you so much

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I was charged but i havent used the product in a while i am a student and need a refund please

Invoice no.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I have trialled the product but do not want to continue the paid subscription.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hello, I unfortunately did not authorize or failed to cancel in time but would like a refund as i have not had time to use the product much and wont be able to in the immediate future.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Never signed up for this or used this product

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Never signed up for this or used this product

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Never signed up for this or used this product

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Never signed up for this or used this product

Invoice no.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I forgot to cancel my subscription and have not used the product since payment.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I have never used your products but you billed me without my permission. Please refund me

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: We are requesting an immediate refund.  We tried this for free and ending up having to get our product reprinted by Office Depot.  At this time we would like an immediate refund.  We will not be using Canva again.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Actually your product doesn't meet my requirements. i  am a youtube I want to create  videos  more than 30 min duration.  your product is  only support  1min length videos, so  don't want your  service. so please refund the subscription amount ASAP.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Guys, i just wanted to try your product but i´ve noticed that you charged me a whole year subscription and i haven´t been asked. Please refund that charge as soon as posible.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Never signed up for or used this product

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I didn't need this product. Someone recommended it and I wanted to give it a try. 

Kindly refund the subscription fees. Thank you.

Invoice number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: I had canceled my subscription after the 30-day trial period, but the invoice has arrived. I request that the amount be returned to me, since at this time I do not wish to contract your product. Thank you

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Please cancel and refund my card.  I have not utilized your product.  Thank you.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I thought I was going to use this and realized I have no use for it. I am sorry. It's a great product and I recommend it others but with my current situation, I have no use for it. Thank you.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I would like a refund of the fee charged on 2/5/2021.  I do not have time to teach myself about the product.  How do I get a refund?

Invoice number: <NUMBER>Reason for the refund request: I would like to be refunded because I have not used the products and I have no use for them, I would also like to be able to delete my account by same occasion

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I have not used your product and it does not do what I need it to

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: still have not received product. today is 1/22/2021

Refund request reason: Hello I asked to cancel Canva in august 2020 but
I see I am still paying for a product I have never used and as I’m not working I cannot even afford to be paying this 
Please cancel with immediate effect 
Thank you 
Angie Johnson 

Invoice no.: <NUMBER>
